title: Waivers
context: ยง481M-12 Waivers. A lessor shall not require a lessee to waive: (1) Service of process; (2) Any defense; (3) Any counterclaim; or (4) Right of action against the lessor or a person acting on the lessor&rsquo;s behalf as the lessor&rsquo;s agent; in collection of payments under the lease-purchase agreement or in repossession of the leased property. [L 1997, c 248, pt of ยง1; am L 2008, c 19, ยง32]
